pages.title: Getting Started with Confluence
pages.content:
# Getting Started with Confluence

Confluence is a team workspace where knowledge comes together. Here's how to get started:

## Creating Your First Page

1. Navigate to your space
2. Click 'Create' button
3. Select 'Page'
4. Add title and content
5. Click 'Publish'

## Best Practices

- Use clear, descriptive titles
- Organize content with headings
- Link to related pages
- Add labels for better discovery

## Next Steps

Check out the [API Documentation](./12346) or [Architecture Overview](./12347) for more information.
pages.author: John Doe

pages.title: API Documentation
pages.content:
# API Documentation

## Overview

Confluence provides a comprehensive REST API for programmatic access to content and metadata.

## Search API

```bash
GET /wiki/rest/api/search
```

**Parameters:**
- `text` (required): Search query
- `limit`: Number of results (default: 25, max: 100)
- `spaceKey`: Filter by space
- `type`: Content type (page, attachment, etc.)

**Example:**

```bash
curl -H 'Authorization: Bearer TOKEN' \
  'https://confluence.atlassian.net/wiki/rest/api/search?text=confluence&limit=10'
```

## Pages API

```bash
GET /wiki/rest/api/content/{pageId}
POST /wiki/rest/api/content
PUT /wiki/rest/api/content/{pageId}
DELETE /wiki/rest/api/content/{pageId}
```

## Authentication

Use API token with Basic Auth or Bearer token in Authorization header.
pages.author: John Smith

pages.title: Architecture Overview
pages.content:
# Architecture Overview

## System Components

### Content Scripts
- Injected into web pages
- Extract page content
- Communicate with background service
- Inject UI panel

### Background Service Worker
- Handle API requests
- Manage authentication
- Cache data
- Process LLM requests

### UI Panel
- Render chat interface
- Display responses
- Handle user input
- Show settings

## Data Flow

```
User Input → Content Script → Background Service → LLM / API
  ↓
Response → UI Panel → IndexedDB (Storage) → Display to User
```

## Key Modules

| Module | Purpose |
|--------|----------|
| `src/api/confluence.ts` | Wiki/API client (optional) |
| `src/llm/client.ts` | LM Studio integration |
| `src/ui/panel.ts` | Chat UI |
| `src/storage/indexdb.ts` | Data persistence |
| `src/search/` | Search and ranking |
pages.author: Alice Miller
